The Mosin-Nagant M38 Carbine is a shorter, more manageable version of the classic rifle, offering solid stopping power with improved mobility.
 In the Zone, it's favored by seasoned stalkers who need reliable, hard-hitting firepower without the bulk of its full length brother.
 Ideal for navigating tighter spaces such as in the underground labs, this may give a slight edge when it matters.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Default: Gunsmith modification kit

The Mosin-Nagant is a rugged, bolt-action rifle known for its long-range accuracy and powerful 7.62?54mmR round.
 It has always been a trusted relic favored by sharpshooters, hunters, and old-school stalkers who value simplicity, durability, and raw stopping power over modern flash.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: PU Scope, KZRZP suppressor
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Default: Gunsmith modification kit

The Mosin-Nagant Obrez is a sawn-off version of the Mosin-Nagant bolt-action rifle, with its barrel and stock cut down to create a much shorter, more concealable weapon.
 This modification was historically used by Stalkers who needed a powerful firearm in a compact form; albeit at the cost of accuracy, control, and safety.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: PU Scope, KZRZP suppressor
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Default: Specialized modification kit
